move_details.name: camouflage
move_details.effect_description: User’s type changes according to the terrain.  Terrain        | New type -------------- | -------------- Building       | normal Cave           | rock Desert         | ground Grass          | grass Mountain       | rock Ocean          | water Pond           | water Road           | ground Snow           | ice Tall grass     | grass  In Pokémon Battle Revolution:  Terrain        | New type -------------- | -------------- Courtyard      | normal Crystal        | rock Gateway        | water Magma          | rock Main Street    | normal Neon           | normal Stargazer      | rock Sunny Park     | grass Sunset         | ground Waterfall      | grass
move_details.flavor_text: Alters the POKéMON’s type depending on the location.
